survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Ergonomics Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on workplace ergonomics to improve comfort, productivity, and overall job satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your workstation?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels clearly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your workstation?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use at your workstation? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to get a comprehensive view of ergonomic equipment usage.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use at your workstation? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any discomfort or pain related to your workstation setup in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify immediate ergonomic issues employees are facing.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any discomfort or pain related to your workstation setup in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the type of discomfort or pain you experienced.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended response allows employees to provide detailed feedback on specific ergonomic issues.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the type of discomfort or pain you experienced.

questions.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or adjustments would you like to see in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for future ergonomic improvements.

script.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or adjustments would you like to see in your workspace?
